description: Numbers that are the sum of 2 distinct nonzero squares in exactly 5 ways.
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
mathematica: nn = 111250; t = Table[0, {nn}]; lim = Floor[Sqrt[nn - 1]]; Do[num = i^2 + j^2; If[num <= nn, t[[num]]++], {i, lim}, {j, i - 1}]; Flatten[Position[t, 5]] (* _T. D. Noe_, Apr 07 2011 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
